articles.author: Idrees Ali, Arshad Mohammed
articles.title: Many Iranian options to retaliate against Israel, but all carry risk - Reuters
articles.description: Iran faces a dilemma following an Israeli attack on its embassy in Syria: how to retaliate without sparking a wider conflict that Middle East analysts said Tehran doesn't appear to want.

articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S20 series won't get any more monthly updates - Android Central
articles.description: The Galaxy S20 series' four-year run has come to an end.
articles.content:
What you need to know
